colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI SDE SNOD 'DZIN PA RJE DRUNG DKON MCHOG RGYAL MTSAN GYIS, LHAG BSAM RAB DKAR GYI DRIS LAN NANG GI ,SPYOD LAM THAMS CAD DGE SBYOR DU, 'KHYER BA'I RMAD BYUNG THABS MKHAS MCHOG ,CES PA'I RGYAS BSHAD, SDOM GSUM LDAN PA'I DGE SLONG GIS NYIN ZHAG PHRUGS GCIG LA CHOS SPYOD BYA BA'I RIM PA, MDOR NA ZAS KYI RNAM 'BYOR, PHUD MCHOD CHANG BU, YON SBYONG GI SNGAGS SOGS KYANG THUS SHING, GO BDE BA ZHIG CIS KYANG DGOS CES NAN GYIS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS, RIM MED PA'I DAM PA MANG POS MDZAD PA'I CHOS SPYOD RAB GSAL RNAMS DANG, KHYAD PAR THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BU STON RIN PO CHES MDZAD PA'I RNAMS KHYEN DU 'GROD PA'I BDE LAM GYIS SNYING BSDUS, GZUNGS 'DI DAG DAM PA SO SOS BKOD PA GCIG MI GCIGS @005B SNA TSOGS 'DUG PA RNAMS, LO TZ'A BA THUGS RJE DPAL BA DANG, ZHU LU LO TZ'A BA SOGS KYIS DAG STER MDZAD PA'I DPE KHUNGS THUB RNAMS LA GTUGS TE DAG PAR BYAS NAS, CHOS GRVA CHEN PO BKRA SHIS LHUN PO'I GTZUG LAG KHANG DU SUG BRIS SU BYAS SO, ,)
